# vertexBindings

**Instance Property**

An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s vertex shader.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexBindings: [any MTLBinding] { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBinding] elements in the array are in the same order as the vertex shader’s declaration signature.

## Inspecting a shader’s parameter

- **fragmentBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s fragment shader.
- **meshBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s mesh shader.
- **objectBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s object shader.
- **tileBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s tile shader.
